name: 2020: Urgh Odyssey
description:
2020 may be an Odyssey of Urghs...

But this short and fun Blast for a High-Score hopefully isn't!

Developer High-Score: 245

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to shoot
LeftShift to Shield

A hint: catching shots from the Boss with the shield recharges you weapon real fast!

Submission for the GB Jam 8. 

Sound design by Danae Le Guennic
A TightControls production.
